ModMetaData.name: 1trickPwnyta's Anomaly Patch
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
This mod makes a handful of small tweaks to the Anomaly DLC that are intended to make the game a bit more enjoyable without changing the gameplay too much.
Full list of tweaks: - Selecting multiple bioferrite harvesters shows the total amount of bioferrite contained in all of them - Only checks home maps and any map where colonists are for threats when selecting music (to prevent horror combat/tension music from playing endlessly after running away from a pit gate battle)
